title: Greek Yogurt Caesar Dressing (0% Version)
description: A lighter, high-protein Caesar dressing made with 0% Greek yogurt instead of mayo. Creamy, tangy, and perfect for salads, wraps, or dipping sweet potato fries.
ingredients: 2 tsp lemon juice (or 1 1/2 tsp bottled lemon juice)
1/2 tsp garlic purée (or 1 small clove, finely minced)
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, Dijon, and maple syrup until smooth and creamy.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until fully incorporated.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
If the dressing is too thick, thin gradually with 1–2 teaspoons of cold water or milk until desired consistency.
Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving for best flavor.
notes: For a more classic Caesar flavor, add 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce or a few drops of anchovy paste. Keeps up to 5 days refrigerated. Great on kale or romaine salads, in chicken wraps, or as a dip.
